title: Schema for csvw foreign key reference object
description: An object property that identifies a referenced table and a set of referenced columns within that table.

resource.description: A link property holding a URL that is the identifier for a specific table that is being referenced.

schemaReference.description: A link property holding a URL that is the identifier for a schema that is being referenced.

columnReference.description: A column reference property that holds either a single reference (by name) to a column description object within the tableSchema of the referenced table, or an array of such references.
